8.0.0

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2023 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2023-8.0.0.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.amzn2023.aarch64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.amzn2023.aarch64.rpm

  • Amazon Linux 2023 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon2023-8.0.0.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.amzn2023.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.amzn2023.x86_64.rpm

  • Debian 12.0 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-debian12-8.0.0.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_8.0.0_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_8.0.0_amd64.deb

  • macOS ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-macos-arm64-8.0.0.tgz

  • macOS x64

    • Archive: mongodb-macos-x86_64-8.0.0.tgz

  • RedHat / CentOS 8.0 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-rhel8-8.0.0.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.el8.aarch64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.el8.aarch64.rpm

  • RedHat / CentOS 8.0 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-rhel8-8.0.0.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.el8.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.el8.x86_64.rpm

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.el9.aarch64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.el9.aarch64.rpm

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-8.0.0-1.el9.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-8.0.0-1.el9.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_8.0.0_arm64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_8.0.0_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_7.0.8_amd64.deb

7.0.2

Note:

MongoDB version 7.0.2 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), SERVER-82353, SERVER-84723, and SERVER-87061 and consider upgrading to the latest version

6.0.13

Note:

MongoDB version 6.0.13 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2-6.0.13.tgz

6.0.12

Note:

MongoDB version 6.0.12 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, and SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2-6.0.12.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-6.0.12-1.amzn2.aarch64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-6.0.12-1.amzn2.aarch64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-6.0.12-1.amzn2.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_6.0.12_amd64.deb

  • Debian 11.0 x64

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_6.0.12_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_6.0.12_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-6.0.12-1.el9.x86_64.rpm

6.0.6

Note:

MongoDB version 6.0.6 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), and SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

6.0.5

Note:

MongoDB version 6.0.5 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), SERVER-82353, and WT-10551 (if relying on incremental backups on Ops Manager or Cloud Manager clusters) and consider upgrading to the latest version

6.0.1

Note:

MongoDB version 6.0.1 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), SERVER-82353, WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures), and WT-10551 (if relying on incremental backups on Ops Manager or Cloud Manager clusters) and consider upgrading to the latest version

5.0.24

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.24 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

5.0.23

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.23 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, and SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.21 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), and SERVER-82353 and consider upgrading to the latest version

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_5.0.18_amd64.deb

Note:

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell-5.0.13-1.amzn2.aarch64.rpm

5.0.12

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.12 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), SERVER-82353, WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures), and WT-10551 (if relying on incremental backups on Ops Manager or Cloud Manager clusters) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2-5.0.12.tgz

5.0.8

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.8 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-68511, SERVER-77506, SERVER-80203 (if using Time Series collections sharded by metaField embedded objects), SERVER-82353, WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures), and WT-10551 (if relying on incremental backups on Ops Manager or Cloud Manager clusters) and consider upgrading to the latest version

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_5.0.1_arm64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_5.0.1_amd64.deb

5.0.0

Note:

MongoDB version 5.0.0 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-58936, SERVER-68511, SERVER-77506, SERVER-82353, WT-7984, WT-7995, and WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_4.4.27_arm64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.4.27_arm64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.27_arm64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.4.27_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.27_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.23_arm64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.4.23_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.23_amd64.deb

  • Windows x64

Note:

MongoDB version 4.4.21 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-82353, and WT-10551 (if relying on incremental backups on Ops Manager or Cloud Manager clusters) and consider upgrading to the latest version

4.4.6

Note:

MongoDB version 4.4.6 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-82353, WT-7995, and WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2-4.4.6.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-4.4.6-1.amzn2.aarch64.rpm

4.4.5

Note:

MongoDB version 4.4.5 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-82353, WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures), WT-7995, and WT-7426 and consider upgrading to the latest version

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_4.4.4_arm64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.4.4_arm64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.4_arm64.deb

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-ubuntu2004-4.4.4.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_4.4.4_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.4.4_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.4.4_amd64.deb

  • Windows x64

    • Archive: mongodb-windows-x86_64-4.4.4.zip

4.4.3

Note:

MongoDB version 4.4.3 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with SERVER-77506, SERVER-82353, WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures), and WT-7995 and consider upgrading to the latest version

  • Amazon Linux 2 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon2-4.4.3.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-4.4.3-1.amzn2.x86_64.rpm

4.2.23

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.23 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 ARM 64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-aarch64-amazon2-4.2.23.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-4.2.23-1.amzn2.aarch64.rpm

    • Archive: mongodb-win32-x86_64-2012plus-4.2.10.zip

4.2.6

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.6 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon2-4.2.6.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server-4.2.6-1.amzn2.x86_64.rpm

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos-4.2.6-1.amzn2.x86_64.rpm

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon-4.2.6.tgz

  • Debian 10.0 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-debian10-4.2.6.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Utilities Package: mongodb-org-tools_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.2.6_amd64.deb

  • Debian 9.2 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-debian92-4.2.6.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Utilities Package: mongodb-org-tools_4.2.6_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_4.2.6_amd64.deb

  • macOS x64

    • Archive: mongodb-macos-x86_64-4.2.6.tgz

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-rhel62-4.2.6.tgz

4.2.5

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.5 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Release Notes

  • Amazon Linux 2 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon2-4.2.5.tgz

4.2.3

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.3 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

4.2.2

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.2 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

  • Amazon Linux 2 x64

4.2.1

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.1 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

Note:

MongoDB version 4.2.0 has a critical issue, if you are running this version in production, please familiarize yourself with WT-10461 (if running on ARM64 or POWER system architectures) and consider upgrading to the latest version

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_4.0.6_amd64.deb

  • Amazon Linux x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-amazon-3.4.17.tgz

  • Debian 8.1 x64

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-debian81-3.4.17.tgz

    • Server Package: mongodb-org-server_3.4.17_amd64.deb

    • Mongos Package: mongodb-org-mongos_3.4.17_amd64.deb

    • Utilities Package: mongodb-org-tools_3.4.17_amd64.deb

    • Mongo Shell Package: mongodb-org-shell_3.4.17_amd64.deb

    • Archive: mongodb-linux-x86_64-3.4.17.tgz

  • macOS x64

    • Archive: mongodb-osx-ssl-x86_64-3.4.17.tgz

    • Archive: mongodb-osx-x86_64-3.4.17.tgz
